text:
Beautiful orchid within the enclosure - vibrant colors, nice varieties.  It's a medium size enclosure but still a nice place to duck into to get away from the hot midday sun.

The plants were well arranged around walkway.
Best place in Singapore to see Orchids! A must visit place for orchid loving tourist to Singapore.
It's pretty but nothing particularly special. Don't feel bad if you missed this as you were walking through the National Orchid Garden.
This new area is totally worth the entrance fee, compared to Gardens by the bay it's smaller but less the crowd and much more affordable ($1 for senior!)

I find various orchid with vibrant colors here, chili red, blood red, violet..
And also special orchids from paphiopedilum family.
